price: 彼ら（噓つきたち）が、地獄の業火へと荒々しく押しやられる日。
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
